posts.post_content:
Looking to move a few cards to raise some extra $ for the National.  Also willing to discuss prices on any of the other cards on my for sale page.

Nice T205 Cobb with no creases accurately graded SGC 50.  Last 5 PSA 4 and last 5 SGC 50 sales average $1719.  Asking $1719 + shipping for this one.  Check/MO preferred, Paypal add 3%.
